## MeshMaterial.getInstancedUniforms() method

Get the list of per-instance uniforms for this material class.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        prop: string;
        type: InstanceUniformType;
        offset: number;
        name: string;
    }[];
```
**Returns:**

{ prop: string; type: InstanceUniformType; offset: number; name: string; }\[\]
